game.title: The Final Fantasy
game.synopsis: A young boy named Cloud Strife and his friends set out to stop a madman from using the power of the planet to destroy the world.
game.beginning: Cloud Strife, a young man from Nibelheim, is recruited by Shinra, a company harnessing the planet's power, to join their elite SOLDIER unit.
game.ending: After joining Shinra, Cloud is sent to investigate a monster attacking Midgar. Along with friends Tifa, Aerith, and Barret, they uncover a sinister plot by Shinra threatening the planet. They must stop Shinra before it's too late.
